name: Erlangstudy
body:
### Welcome to my GitHub page.
The Project "ErlangStudy" which i use to practice Erlang programming skill.

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git clone git@github.com:wangyangkobe/ErlangStudy.git
```

If you're using the GitHub for Mac, simply sync your repository and you'll see the new branch.

## ### The project about "findnode".
**findnode:  multicast UDP based, a node group corresponds to a multicast ip/port combination.**

```
findNodeServer.erl  This file is the server. You should first start the server in one node.
findNodeServer.erl  This file is the client.
```

## ### The project about "hhs_game".
**This project is a game server. By now, the project has realize: user register, user login, game room create and game hall create.

### Authors and Contributors
Anthing wrong with code, pls contact 250801860@qq.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
